channel.title: Help with my server
channel.description:
every time I try to make a server i get this
------------------------------------------------------------------------------- / \ / Now compiling server... \ / \ ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- / \ / Now starting server... \ / \ ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue . . .
if u can help me in any way thank you!!!

item.title: Help with my server

@kyle1323 wrote:

oh ya did you extract files? did something go wrong while extracting the ffiles?

item.title: Help with my server
item.dc:creator: @i_musician_i i musician i
item.description:
@i_musician_i wrote:

UMM well did u extract files? when u click run server try extract all w8t for it to load then another file of (scape) fill come up click on that then click on its run server then it should maybe work.

          If this didnt work replie back.

Read full topic
